Text: We are communicating directly with this small group of impacted customers with support and next steps, via messages in the CommBank app and NetBank. Most customers will be unaffected. If you need more information on the eftpos issue please go to https://t.co/TsKrDnk6mS.
Due to an industry-wide eftpos issue, a small minority of our customers who pay with their debit cards in digital wallets may experience issues using eftpos from midnight 31 December 2024.
